languages.text: {n}Медина с облегчением выдыхает.{/n} "Сударыня, вы, наверное, просто перенервничали. Со всей этой пальбой вокруг, безумными калеками и мятежниками неудивительно, что у вас в глазах потемнело. Ничего, развеетесь слегка на празднике и будете как новенькая!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Медина с облегчением выдыхает.{/n} "Сударыня, вы, наверное, просто перенервничали. Со всей этой пальбой вокруг, безумными калеками и мятежниками неудивительно, что у вас в глазах потемнело. Ничего, развеетесь слегка на празднике и будете как новенькая!"

languages.text: {n}Medineh breathes a sigh of relief.{/n} "You have no doubt been through a lot lately, ma'am. Small wonder your vision had a dim spell with all this shooting everywhere, let alone all these maimed and maddened insurgents. It will be all right. The festivities will distract you and you'll feel right as rain again!"
languages.original_text: {n}Медина с облегчением выдыхает.{/n} "Сударыня, вы, наверное, просто перенервничали. Со всей этой пальбой вокруг, безумными калеками и мятежниками неудивительно, что у вас в глазах потемнело. Ничего, развеетесь слегка на празднике и будете как новенькая!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Medineh breathes a sigh of relief.{/n} "Perhaps you've been through a lot of stress, ma'am. All this shooting everywhere, the maimed and maddened people, the insurgents. Small wonder your vision went dim. It's all right. The festivities will distract you a little, and you'll be fine and dandy again!"

Small wonder your vision went dim. It's all right. The festivities will distract you a little, and you'll be fine and dandy again!"

The festivities will distract you and you'll feel fresh again!"

The festivities will distract you and you'll feel fresh again!"

Small wonder your vision had a dim spell with all this shooting everywhere, let alone all these maimed and maddened insurgents. It will be all right. The festivities will distract you and you'll feel right as rain again!"

languages.text: {n}Medineh atmet erleichtert aus.{/n} "Ihr habt in letzter Zeit viel durchgemacht, Madam. Kein Wunder, dass sich Eure Sicht bei den vielen Feuergefechten vorübergehend trübt, ganz zu schweigen von den verstümmelten, wahnsinnigen Aufständischen. Es kommt alles wieder in Ordnung. Die Festlichkeiten werden Euch ablenken, dann fühlt Ihr Euch wieder putzmunter!"
languages.original_text: {n}Medineh breathes a sigh of relief.{/n} "You have no doubt been through a lot lately, ma'am. Small wonder your vision had a dim spell with all this shooting everywhere, let alone all these maimed and maddened insurgents. It will be all right. The festivities will distract you and you'll feel right as rain again!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Medineh atmet erleichtert aus.{/n} "Vielleicht, Ihr habt in letzter Zeit viel durchgemacht, Madam. Kein Wunder, dass sich Eure Sicht bei den vielen Feuergefechten vorübergehend trübt, ganz zu schweigen von den verstümmelten, wahnsinnigen Aufständischen. Es kommt alles wieder in Ordnung. Die Festlichkeiten werden Euch ablenken, dann fühlt Ihr Euch wieder frisch!"

languages.text: {n}Medineh pousse un soupir de soulagement.{/n} « Vous avez traversé pas mal d'épreuves dernièrement, madame. Rien d'étonnant à ce que votre vision se soit obscurcie avec tous ces tirs, sans parler de tous ces insurgés déments et mutilés. Ça va aller. Les célébrations vont vous distraire et vous remettre les idées en place ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Medineh breathes a sigh of relief.{/n} "You have no doubt been through a lot lately, ma'am. Small wonder your vision had a dim spell with all this shooting everywhere, let alone all these maimed and maddened insurgents. It will be all right. The festivities will distract you and you'll feel right as rain again!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Medineh pousse un soupir de soulagement.{/n} « Vous avez peut-être traversé pas mal d'épreuves dernièrement, madame. Rien d'étonnant à ce que votre vision se soit obscurcie avec tous ces tirs, sans parler de tous ces insurgés déments et mutilés. Ça va aller. Les célébrations vont vous distraire et vous requinquer ! »

languages.text: {n}梅迪涅松了口气。{/n}“肯定是因为你最近经历了太多事情，女士。外面到处都是枪林弹雨，还有穷凶极恶、被人挖了眼睛的叛乱分子，也难怪你会吓得眼睛都出问题了。好好享受一下庆典，散散心就好了，你会再次感到神清气爽的！”
languages.original_text: {n}Medineh breathes a sigh of relief.{/n} "You have no doubt been through a lot lately, ma'am. Small wonder your vision had a dim spell with all this shooting everywhere, let alone all these maimed and maddened insurgents. It will be all right. The festivities will distract you and you'll feel right as rain again!"

traits.locale_text: {n}梅迪涅松了口气。{/n}“或许是你最近经历了太多事情，女士。外面到处都是枪林弹雨，还有穷凶极恶、被人挖了眼睛的叛乱分子，也难怪你会吓得眼睛都出问题了。好好享受一下庆典，散散心就好了，你会再次感到神清气爽的！”

languages.text: {n}メディネは安堵のため息をつく。{/n}「最近、いろいろなことがあったことだろう。この銃撃戦のせいで、視界が悪くなるのも無理はない。ましてや、重傷を負って、気が触れた反乱者もいる。大丈夫。お祝いで気を紛らわせれば、また雨のように晴れやかな気分になれるだろう！」
languages.original_text: {n}Medineh breathes a sigh of relief.{/n} "You have no doubt been through a lot lately, ma'am. Small wonder your vision had a dim spell with all this shooting everywhere, let alone all these maimed and maddened insurgents. It will be all right. The festivities will distract you and you'll feel right as rain again!"

traits.locale_text: {n}メディネは安堵のため息をつく。{/n}「最近、いろいろなことがあったことだろう。この銃撃戦のせいで、視界が悪くなるのも無理はない。ましてや、重傷を負って、気が触れた反乱者もいる。大丈夫。お祝いで気を紛らわせれば、気分がスッキリするさ」

languages.text: {n}Medineh respira aliviado.{/n} «Ha pasado por muchas cosas en poco tiempo, señora. No es de extrañar que la visión se nublara con tanto tiroteo, por no hablar de todos esos insurgentes mutilados y enloquecidos. Se arreglará. Las fiestas le distraerán y volverá a sentirse estupendamente».
languages.original_text: {n}Medineh breathes a sigh of relief.{/n} "You have no doubt been through a lot lately, ma'am. Small wonder your vision had a dim spell with all this shooting everywhere, let alone all these maimed and maddened insurgents. It will be all right. The festivities will distract you and you'll feel right as rain again!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Medineh respira aliviado.{/n} «Tal vez ha pasado por mucho últimamente, señora. No es de extrañar que la visión se nublara con tanto tiroteo, por no hablar de todos esos insurgentes mutilados y enloquecidos. Se arreglará. Las fiestas le distraerán y volverá a sentirse bien».

languages.text: {n}Medineh rahat bir nefes alıyor.{/n} "Son zamanlarda çok şey yaşadığınız belli hanımefendi. Tüm o sakatlanmış ve delirmiş asileri geçtim, sırf silahlı çatışmalardan bile gözünüzün kararmasına şaşmamalı. Her şey düzelecek. Kutlama sayesinde dikkatiniz dağılacak, yeniden iyi hissedeceksiniz!"
languages.original_text: {n}Medineh breathes a sigh of relief.{/n} "You have no doubt been through a lot lately, ma'am. Small wonder your vision had a dim spell with all this shooting everywhere, let alone all these maimed and maddened insurgents. It will be all right. The festivities will distract you and you'll feel right as rain again!"

Kutlama sayesinde dikkatiniz dağılacak, yeniden iyi hissedeceksiniz!"
